Ying Yang.Description: A concept from Chinese philosophy associated with balance between opposing forces.

Chaos.Description: A name used here for a person with the surname 'Chaos.'

Freedom's Call.Description: A call for liberation and freedom from constraints.

Blessed.Description: A spiritual path associated with blessings and divine favor.

Readers.Description: Involves engagement in religious texts and practices.

Spirituality.Description: The pursuit of inner meaning and personal growth through faith.

Dogma.Description: A set of beliefs and practices forming the foundation of a faith.

Faith's Call.Description: A call or direction from faith to guide personal actions or decisions.

Mysticism.Description: Involves introspection and spiritual practices for self-discovery.

Evolution.Description: A continuous change in development and growth.

magic_systems.name: Soft Power
magic_systems.description: Focuses on mimetic beings called rhythms that form shimmery clouds.

magic_systems.name: Prophecy
magic_systems.description: A vision or information revealed through a character's experience.

magic_systems.name: Lacrimaturgy
magic_systems.description: Involves people crying colors with different properties and uses.

magic_systems.name: Heartbeat
magic_systems.description: A societal construct affecting interactions, which can be pleasant or intimidating.

magic_systems.name: Rhythms
magic_systems.description: Mimetic beings formed by focused heartbeats creating shimmery clouds.

key_points.point: Each system is defined by a unique process and procedure.
The use of descriptive language enhances immersion.
A big plot twist reveals the magic system as a tool in a murder mystery.

historical_context.text: Circa 1900, empires rise and fall, changing societal structures.
